dt: {bc}being within the limits of ability, capacity, or realization
{bc}being what may be conceived, be done, or occur according to nature, custom, or manners
{bc}being something that may or may not occur
{bc}being something that may or may not be true or actual

pt: {sc}possible{/sc} {sc}practicable{/sc} {sc}feasible{/sc} mean capable of being realized. {sc}possible{/sc} implies that a thing may certainly exist or occur given the proper conditions.

pt.t: a {it}possible{/it} route up the west face of the mountain

pt: {sc}practicable{/sc} implies that something may be effected by available means or under current conditions.

pt.t: a solution that is not {it}practicable{/it} in the time available

pt: {sc}feasible{/sc} applies to what is likely to work or be useful in attaining the end desired.

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}possibilis{/it}, from {it}posse{/it} to be able, from {it}potis, pote{/it} able + {it}esse{/it} to be {ma}{mat|potent|}, {mat|is|}{/ma}
shortdef: being within the limits of ability, capacity, or realization
being what may be conceived, be done, or occur according to nature, custom, or manners
being something that may or may not occur

dt.t: We'll do everything {it}humanly possible{/it} to help.
Do your best to come home from work early, {it}if (at all) possible{/it}.

meta.id: outside the realm of the possible
stems: outside the realm of the possible

hwi.hw: outside the realm of the possible

dt.t: Finishing the job today is {it}outside the realm of the possible{/it}.
I like to go swimming {it}whenever possible{/it}.

meta.id: within the realm of the possible
stems: within the realm of the possible

hwi.hw: within the realm of the possible

dt: {bc}able to be done or to happen {bc}possible

shortdef: able to be done or to happen : possible

stems: the best of all possible worlds

dt.t: The current economic situation is {it}the best of all possible worlds{/it} for investors.
